PAPIER-MACHE PEN HOLDERS.

This exquisite pen stands is perfect for your study table , office tables. This beautiful art form has been adapted to create these exquisite items of beauty and utility. This elegant and alluring Papier-Mache holder is totally affordable and will compliment your style giving an artistic touch to your ambience.

Material:
    Papier-Mache.
Care:
    simply dust it with a cotton cloth.
Usage:
    used to store pens and pencils.
Sizes:
    4’’X3’’, 4’’X 2 1/2’’.
Shipping Info:
    Dispatched in a maximum of 6 business days.

PAPIER-MACHE STAR SET
